content_html: Kathmandu, Sept 15: Finance Minister Rameshwor Khanal has assumed the office after taking the oath of office and secrecy today. He formed a three-member taskforce on prioritization of project for the effective budget implementation. The taskforce is formed under the coordination of chief of Budget Di

title: Finance Minister Khanal assumes office, forms taskforce on budget implementation
